channel.title: Xurses || on VPS || Going to be BIG || GE || 317 || Highscores || Sponsored
channel.description:
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/16h1cth.gif[/img]
[b]Objectives:[/b] [i]Make GE Make a few Custom Crowns/edit ones there, very easy to do Add alot more items, update the frame to revision 474 eventually, for now we will stay 317 add everything legit, just higher exp rates Redo all skills Drops Redone whole lot of custom npcs/items added (Godwars etc) *Much Much more [/i]
[b]Looking for:[/b] [i][s]Mod[/s]. Server Coder, Admin, Client Coder and Web Designer [/i]
[b]Apply Application:[/b] [i]For: Experiance(must have proof): Age: How dedicated can you be to the project: MSN: (PM me your MSN don't put it out for others to see it )[/i]
[b]Client Coder [/b][i]Need to be able to redo all sprites, Add more player rights client sided, add more maps. on a delta client and make a webclient. must be able to add animations client sided, must be able to add new tabs and also, update sprites, add custom items, do full screen, must be able to use tom's cache editor to fix a few objects ***most listed are easy to do*** [/i]
[b]Server Coder[/b] [i]Most have experience I have been coding for two years, I will be fine if you are semi new but know a few things that might come in handey like making shops, easy stuff you can do while I do hard stuff[/i]
[b]Mod [/b][i][s]Most have good technics of getting people, Most be helpful to players and not bash anyone [/s][/i] [b]Web designer [/b][i]make a sleek, plain and simple looking layout, know html[/i]
[b]Staff[/b] [i]Server name: Xurses Owner: Gardner Co-Owner: Cody GFX designer: Michael Web Designer: Open Client Coder: Open, Open Mod: Kattoor Admin: Closed Server Coder: Me, Cowarooroo[/i]
Inerface [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/xp4j9f.jpg[/img] Quest Interface [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2ds4ug8.jpg[/img] ::ge command [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/esrwpi.jpg[/img]
[i]Note: If you can do most things listed and willing to learn other things that is alright to we can work together to figure it out [/i]
fences are fixed [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/900rxx.jpg[/img]
my work: spent only a month on this just to show what I can do with little time http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,500947.0.html
Each person will get their own Crown Ingame [b]Base/creds: [/b][i]Falcon Scape[/i]
[i]Sponsored[/i]
Deltascape shitty attack timers and switching redone :d

item.title: Xurses || on VPS || Going to be BIG || GE || 317 || Highscores || Sponsored
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

For:server coder

Experiance(must have proof): i have made a server or two before, nothing special. i am currently coding for a delta server for the hell of it but looking for something worthwhile.
i am not a great coder but i am definitely willing to learn!

Age: 16

How dedicated can you be to the project: very dedicated i am not really doing anything else rsps wise

this sounds like a good project and with a little effort and time i think those goals are achievable.

Read full topic

item.title: Xurses || on VPS || Going to be BIG || GE || 317 || Highscores || Sponsored
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

Objectives:
Make GE
Make a few Custom Crowns/edit ones there, very easy to do
Add alot more items, update the frame to revision 474 eventually, for now we will stay 317
add everything legit, just higher exp rates
Redo all skills
Drops Redone
whole lot of custom npcs/items added (Godwars etc)
*Much Much more

Looking for: Mod. Server Coder, Admin, Client Coder and Web Designer

Apply Application:
For:
Experiance(must have proof):
Age:
How dedicated can you be to the project:
MSN: (PM me your MSN don’t put it out for others to see it )

Client Coder
Need to be able to redo all sprites, Add more player rights client sided, add more maps. on a delta client and make a webclient. must be able to add animations client sided, must be able to add new tabs and also, update sprites, add custom items, do full screen, must be able to use tom’s cache editor to fix a few objects most listed are easy to do

Server Coder
Most have experience I have been coding for two years, I will be fine if you are semi new but know a few things that might come in handey like making shops, easy stuff you can do while I do hard stuff

Mod
Most have good technics of getting people, Most be helpful to players and not bash anyone

Web designer
make a sleek, plain and simple looking layout, know html

Staff
Server name: Xurses
Owner: Gardner
Co-Owner: Cody
GFX designer: Michael
Web Designer: Open
Client Coder: Open, Open
Mod: Kattoor
Admin: Closed
Server Coder: Me, Cowarooroo

Inerface

Quest Interface

::ge command

Note: If you can do most things listed and willing to learn other things that is alright to we can work together to figure it out

fences are fixed

my work: spent only a month on this just to show what I can do with little time

programming, irc, cars
